page.title: 17HOMES IN WOOBURN GREEN
page.content: The majority of the houses in the area are owner occupied,and have 3\4 bed- rooms.50% live on estates built since 1950,33% live in older houses and a few people live in bungalows. All modern houses are centrally heated,mainly by gas,then electricity and a small number by solid fuel and oil.Most houses have garages and more than one toilet.Modern estate houses have small gardens.There are a few extremely large houses in private grounds.The average price of an estate house is 60,000 pounds. Individual properties are between 60,000 and 200,000 pounds. Many old farm cottages have been renovated into expensive dwellings.
